original_text: Therefore, if your whole body is full of light, and no part of it dark, it will be just as full of light as when a lamp shines its light on you.”
korean_text: 네 온 몸이 밝아 조금도 어두운 데가 없으면 등불의 빛이 너를 비출 때와 같이 온전히 밝으리라 하시니라

sentences.original_text: if your whole body is full of light
sentences.korean_translation: 만일 당신의 온몸이 빛으로 가득 차고

it will be just as full of light
